text: George Pliev, Founder and CEO at @NeurodataLab , in an interview for @paymentsjournal answers the most burning questions about #EmotionAI . Click the link to learn how we approach and use emotion analysis in a range of industries. https:// neurodatalab.com/blog/machines- can-now-read-your-emotions …

What #emotionanalysis can reveal about #politicians ? @NeurodataLab analyzed 805 speeches delivered by Swiss Federal Council members in 2018. For each politician an emotional profile was drawn up. What came of it? Check the article down below to find out! https:// bazonline.ch/schweiz/Gefueh lsanalyse-Ploetzlich-schnellt-Leuthards-Glueckswert-auf-825/story/16555683 …

This January @NeurodataLab will be on #CES2019 , the world's main event for consumer technologies. We will be there with @Promobot , presenting a #robot that can simultaneously recognize the #emotions of several people and react and live-track their reactions! pic.twitter.com/BECkNcLcqe

We decided to test @NeurodataLab ’s #EmotionRecognition algorythm on one of the animated charactrs from a #game . And it worked perfectly. https://www. linkedin.com/feed/update/ur n:li:activity:6475724451383250944 …

Reputation says a lot about a brand. Yet without a basic understanding of the client’s needs and attitudes, it is hard to keep up with the competition. @Neurodata Lab can offer an #EmotionAI -based solution for #CX management https:// youtu.be/DxywEzhZhiU

Сan automatic #emotiondetection reveal a #lie ? A classic lie detector only registers physiological reactions, while the conclusions are debatable. The video shows how emotional analysis is different to the polygraph test - JLaw for Vanity Fair https:// youtu.be/Wlv-Jj9O96I

Neurodata Lab's #EmotionAI -based solution to calculate Customer Satisfaction Index. The technology collects detailed data about client’s emotions at the moment and analyzes them, all while providing accurate statistics. https:// youtu.be/sd2U3TyUtBk

Miami-based @NeurodataLab partner with Russian robot company to build empathetic AI. Wonder how that collaboration came about. https:// russiareports.com/neurodata-lab- partners-with-russian-startup-promobot/1261/ …

In Customer Experience #CX Management, #emotions can reveal whether the customers are satisfied with a product or a service and, if so, how strong they feel about it. Presenting Neurodata Lab's Emotion-AI based solution for CX management. https:// youtu.be/6FLoaexQ6bE
Great Entrepreneur article featuring @NeurodataLab . Explains how technologies such as #chatbots affect #recruitment and change the way companies hire people today. #EmotionAI http:// entm.ag/kys

Neurodata Lab has successfully completed a study aimed to tackle the issue of engagement/disengagement automatic detection. This was a part of the joint research with Dmitriy Fedotov from the Ulm University. The results will be presented at the #ICMI2019 . http:// icmi.acm.org/2018/ pic.twitter.com/MdiSET0t4y

Throughout the last decade we have seen rapid development of emotion technologies, a field called #AffectiveComputing . But when emotions are involved, there always are mysteries. Read about 3 most widespread #myths about #emotions in Affective Computing. https:// medium.com/@neurodatalab/ 3-most-widespread-myths-about-emotions-in-affective-computing-7ae67f427d96 …

Neurodata Lab is proud to be a part of the Program Committee on #PerDial2019 , sharing expertise on human-computer interaction and the role emotion recognition plays in it. #IoT #SmartDevices #DialogueSystems #ContextRecognition #HumanComputer
Oops, will fix that! Here is the link to the video: https://www. linkedin.com/feed/update/ur n:li:activity:6450408523510747136 …

Our paper on RAMAS, #Multimodal Corpus of Dyadic Interaction for #AffectiveComputing , is now on Springer. Published specifically for the upcoming #SPECOM conference, taking place this week in Germany. https:// link.springer.com/chapter/10.100 7/978-3-319-99579-3_52 …

The beginning of autumn has been a productive time for us - tomorrow we are presenting the findings of our recent study of #GazeBehavior during mixed facial #EmotionRecognition at the 19th World Congress of Psychophysiology ( #IOP2018 ), Lucca, Italy. https://www. researchgate.net/publication/32 6551828_Recognition_of_mixed_facial_emotion_has_correlates_in_eye_movement_parameters …
We are proud to announce Dr Alessandro Vinciarelli from the University of Glasgow has become our Science Advisor on #SocialSignalProcessing , a next step in #EmotionAI . pic.twitter.com/KS5xdUsuHT
#ThingsYouShouldNeverAssume - Startups are inherently chaos.

Grigoriy Sterling, Deep Learning Expert, Neurodata Lab, will talk about how speech processing technologies have been developing throughout 2017/2018, and their most interesting and challenging part - #SpeakerDiarization , implemented in our Voice Splitter: http://www. neurodatalab.com/voice-splitter _project.html …

@NeuroDataLab will be speaking at the Moscow Data Science Major meet-up, held by http:// Mail.ru Group and Open Data Science community, the largest in the region. The experts will discuss the latest trends in #MachineLearning , #SpeechRecognition and #ComputerVision . pic.twitter.com/eJPLOyWG91
For more trends see Gartner's #HypeCycle for #EmergingTechnologies 2018 - https://www. gartner.com/smarterwithgar tner/5-trends-emerge-in-gartner-hype-cycle-for-emerging-technologies-2018/ …

In the next years a revolution in devices for #EmotionRecognition will take place all over the world. It will mean both the development of the gadgets and the ways they are used. #EmotionAnalytics are already introduced into wearables to fight epilepsy and handle stress. #Quote pic.twitter.com/jrJ6Y7IQ1P
Check our new website! Now better structured, with updated info about our areas of interest and projects. http://www. neurodatalab.com / pic.twitter.com/WgQSXQKD6S

We begin publishing a series of articles on #EmotionAI in human-computer conversational interfaces. Check our first article on Medium: What is a Multimodal Humanoid Companion for Customer Services: Chatbot - Virtual Assistant - Avatar - Human Robot". https:// medium.com/@neurodatalab/ what-is-a-multimodal-humanoid-companion-for-customer-services-chatbot-virtual-assistant-avatar-92810358dad2 …"

Check out our recent poster about RAMAS presented by Olga Perepelkina, Senior Research Scientist at Neurodata Lab, at the 4th international conference of the European Society for Cognitive and Affective Neuroscience ( #ESCAN2018 ). Available at the link: https://www. researchgate.net/publication/32 6551693_RAMAS_The_Russian_Acted_Multimodal_Affective_Set_for_affective_computing_and_emotion_recognition_studies … pic.twitter.com/75ALrD1Ad0

In #EmotionRecognition , the voice is the second most important source of affective data. Eva Kazimirova, our #SpeechProcessing Specialist, is sharing her expertise in a long read about the basics of #PitchTracking . https:// medium.com/@k.astakhova/p itch-tracking-or-how-to-estimate-the-fundamental-frequency-in-speech-on-the-examples-of-praat-fe0ca50f61fd …

Neurodata Lab is now a Professional Partner of the Artificial Intelligence and Movement #AIMove Post-Master’s Degree, delivered by the MINES ParisTech. We will be happy to contribute to the exchange of expertise between professors, students and business network. pic.twitter.com/I3b0D6ZYzN

Last week, Maria Konstantinova, Research Scientist, presented the findings of the recent study of gaze behavior during mixed facial emotion recognition at #ESCAN2018 . Mixed emotions are a current challenge in #AffectiveComputing . Read more: https://www. researchgate.net/publication/32 6551828_Recognition_of_mixed_facial_emotion_has_correlates_in_eye_movement_parameters …

AI is used to reveal what emotions were on Melania Trumps’s face at the recent summit. We processed the video published by the major media via Neurodata Lab’s emotion recognition algorithms and looked for top-3 emotions. See what happened. #Emotions #AI #PutinTrumpSummit pic.twitter.com/uNkchXCxm2

We are proud to announce we will be among the official speakers of two big international conferences, devoted to the different poles of emotion research: #CognitiveNeuroscience and #SpeechProcessing - ESCAN ( https:// escaneurosci.eu/p/dZ7xbq ) and Interspeech ( http:// interspeech2018.org ). pic.twitter.com/XF4IbAa7Kf

Sport is a prospective field for #EmotionRecognition technology - it is all about emotions. We chose a few of the most emotional moments of #FIFA2018 and processed with our #EmotionRecognition algorithm. Breathtaking! pic.twitter.com/xdTbVNiyzz

Olga Perepelkina, our Chief Research Scientist, gave a talk on #MovementAnalysis at the 5th International Conference on Movement and Computing, 28-30 June, Genoa, Italy. Movement is a valuable source of information about human cognition, as well as emotional and social behaviors. pic.twitter.com/kp0Qxt5Zhh
Remember the most famous selfie? We gave it to our emotion recognition algorithm and that's the result! pic.twitter.com/5vvap7cx0M
Glance through our Medium article on how eye trackers can detect lies: https:// medium.com/@k.astakhova/e ye-tracking-the-best-lie-detector-96ea1064352d …

We are on Medium! Read our first post on #EmotionClassification and learn how it helps #EmotionAI to recognise human emotions and robots to synthesize them. https:// medium.com/@k.astakhova/e motion-classification-at-the-heart-of-affective-computing-f80a3bd45d96 …

When working with #EmotionAI , data are of highest importance. RAMAS is our multimodal dataset with multiple channels (video, audio, motion and physiological data), which is by the way free to use for research purposes. Read more in our recent preprint at: https:// peerj.com/preprints/2668 8/ … pic.twitter.com/ibb2ByK0Is

Now and then of Emotion AI, or emotion recognition technology, in an overview by @NeuroDataLab and the University of Internet professions Netology - The science of emotion." Avaliable here: http://www. neurodatalab.com/en/blog/scienc e-of-emotions/ … pic.twitter.com/B52lN6Ph0W"
@NeuroDataLab thanks for the follow NeuroData! Check out our new website http:// bit.ly/2AHenQF for the new features of human behaviour analytics. Have a great Thursday! :)

A comprehensive classification of affective states is crucial for areas like #EmotionAI and #EmotionRecognition since it is directly connected to the acuracy with which systems recognize emotional and social behaviour. Read more in our recent pre-print at: https:// peerj.com/preprints/2672 9/ … pic.twitter.com/CnWDMQY7D8
Hi! We are now on Twitter to share the latest news and insights on #EmotionAI and #EmotionRecognition from our Emotion AI Hub & R&D lab.
